text: The First Syrian Republic, officially the Syrian Republic, was formed in 1930 as a component of the French Mandate of Syria and Lebanon, succeeding the State of Syria. ==References== ;Notes Category:Former countries in the Middle East Category:Former republics Category:Former polities of the Cold War Category:Establishments in Syria Category:States and territories established in the 20th century Category:States and territories disestablished in the 20th century Category:1930 establishments in Asia Category:1940s disestablishments in Asia Category:1946 disestablishments
title: First Syrian Republic
